title: SRT files for my torrents that have subtitles in them
description:
Attention downloaders:




This folder contains SRT files for my torrents that have subtitles in them.



Some of my torrents had no subtitles associated with them when I uploaded them, so 

you will NOT find SRT files for ALL my torrents in this folder.



There are no 'duplicate' subtitles in the folder. Each SRT file is associated with 

a particular movie. I have 2 or more copies of some movies uploaded in different 

file sizes and at different frame rates, so be careful if you decide to do any 

deleting.


Most of the SRT files in this folder are in English, but there are a few, not many, 

in other languages.


There will NOT be another folder such as this one in the future, because I now 

include SRT files in all my torrents that contain subtitles.


If you find any errors in spelling, etc. fix it yourself or learn to live with it, 

because I don't have time to correct hundreds of thousands of lines of text.



BurtonW
